statements.select: select * from ProduceOtherExitDetail where ProduceOtherExitMaterialId in (select ProduceOtherExitMaterialId from ProduceOtherExitMaterial where (WorkHouseId=#houseid# or #houseid# is null) and ProduceOtherExitMaterialDate between #startDate# and #enddate#)

SELECT * FROM ProduceOtherExitDetail WHERE ProduceOtherExitMaterialId=#ProduceOtherExitMaterialId# AND ProductId IN (SELECT ProductId FROM Product WHERE (Id>=#productId1# OR #productId1# IS NULL) AND (Id<=#productId2# OR #productId2# IS NULL))
